brand_identity.name: JobQuick AI
brand_identity.visual_style: High-Contrast, Structured, Data-Dense, Subtle AI Glow

headings.usage: All section headers, hero titles, modal titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: All paragraph text, data tables, inputs, labels.

mono.usage: Code snippets, API keys, AI confidence scores.

primary.description: Deep Navy/Slate 900. Used for primary actions, headers, strong borders.

accent.description: Royal Blue. Used for active states, links, focus rings.

ai_glow.description: Indigo to Violet gradient. ONLY used for AI-powered features (matching score, smart insights).

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12 for sections. p-6 for cards.

grid_system.marketing: Tetris Grid (Asymmetric). grid-cols-12. Mix col-span-4, col-span-8.
grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid. grid-cols-4. Dense. Gap-4.

styles.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300
styles.ai_action: bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-600 to-violet-600 text-white hover:opacity-90 shadow-md shadow-indigo-200

cards.style: Flat, 1px border. No shadow by default. Hover lifts slightly.
cards.classes: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg hover:border-blue-300 transition-colors duration-200

inputs.style: Sharp, clean borders. Focus ring is critical.
inputs.classes: h-10 rounded-md border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 focus:border-blue-500

hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background or section divider

team_diverse.usage: About us or Employer dashboard empty state

ai_abstract.usage: Background for AI matching section or Login screen sidebar

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px (Thin/Elegant). Size 16px-20px for UI, 24px-32px for Features.

motion.loading: Use skeleton loaders (Shadcn) instead of spinners for content.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
DO NOT center text by default. Left align is stronger for reading.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for AI overlays.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
